title: When Did Marriage Become So Hard?
description: Marriage is hard — and there are signs it's becoming even harder. This week on Hidden Brain, we examine how long-term relationships have changed over time, and whether we might be able to improve marriage by asking less of it.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
